name: Robolution
description:
You are a robot that loves to spin. Big bugs, flying snakes and random meatballorites stand in your way... but with the power of the robolution, you will emerge victorious!

Robolution = Robot + revolution (clever)
Revolution = an instant of revolving e.g. one revolution a second (very clever, we managed to fit the theme of the Godot Wild Jam #22)

Control gravity while you spin with L7-ee (left turns) and R8-e (right turns)! (awesomely clever) Try to run through the different levels without harming our precious robots! (they aren't cheap to repair...)
And be careful with the inertia you carry with your actions. With great power comes great robonsability...

TIP: Please start with R8-e, since it will be easier on your bones (or bolts, as we robots like to say heheh). L7-ee likes experienced hands better!!
